Hi, read the in game Kspedia see the BDA entries,

You will need to adjust the autopilot settings in order for the bomber to fly like a bomber, the AI does not know what you have built so the default settings are more suitable for lighter smaller craft .  The AI can be tuned to fly almost anything from tiny drones to galaxy sized aircraft.
Make sure that your flaps and control surfaces are set correctly , ie rudder controls only yaw,  elevators control only pitch etc
